    ::Domnijoe and Blindchaos::

    Domnijoe did not respond to Cyclonus's last message but rather  
took watch outdoors. She took shelter beside the ship's rotten nose. 
Anybody could see her on approach.
    Inside, Blindchaos continued to grin stupidly.
********

Northlight
Domnijoe Productions
********

> Cyclonus: We're heading your way.
